TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementRemoveAttribute extends System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementMemberAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementRemoveAttribute Inherits ManagementMemberAttribute

summary.span: The ManagementRemoveAttribute is used to indicate that a method cleans up an instance of a managed entity.

span.span: The ManagementRemoveAttribute is used to indicate that a method cleans up an instance of a managed entity.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Метод не должен иметь параметров и должен возвращать тип void.The method must not have any parameters and must return a void type. Применение этого атрибута не имеет влияет на регистрацию класса WMI в репозитории.Use of this attribute does not have any affect on registration of the WMI class in the repository. Он используется только во время выполнения.It is only used at runtime.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of output that the object that is marked with the ManagementRemove attribute will output.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that defines the type of output that the object that is marked with the ManagementRemove attribute will output.

value.span: Объект будет выводить значение, указывающее тип вывода, который возвращает объект, помеченный атрибутом Remove.

span.span: A value that indicates the type of output that the object marked with the Remove attribute will output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Если возвращаемый тип является , а затем выходные данные должны рассматриваться как значение типа .If the returned type is , then the output should be treated as a value of type .
